questions.question: First impressions were generally very good.
They were very pleasant, courteous, and attentive.
Good eye contact was made.
During your meetings they were always focused on you and not on their iPhone/Blackberry/Android/other, more attractive people.
During your Skype calls you didn’t hear any background typing or food munching.
They were dressed in appropriate attire for your meeting.
They treated you very well before you signed their contract.
They treated you very well after you signed their contract.
You felt you were in very capable hands after your first contact/meeting.
There was no doubt in your mind that you had found the One.
They were prepared with research and were well equipped for the project (no blank stares here!)
Their understanding of you or your company’s needs/goals?
Their effort to make you aware of their process, stages and proposed timeline?
